body.name: Lncoon GPS Tracker - 4G LTE Real-Time Car Tracking Device, OBD Plug & Play, Long Trip Tracking, Speed Monitoring for Fleet, Car Rental, Multiple Alert
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 35 mins
features: LNCOON's GPS tracker for vehicles works with OBD-II on 1997 or newer car models. Built-in 4G LTE network available in US, Mexico and Canada. Adapt to 9-36V ACC voltage, the car tracker device compatible with extension cable for discreet hidden working.

LNCOON IOT App supports Android, iOS and PC web, 10-sec update allowing you to keep tracking unlimited vehicles with our GPS tracker installed. Shows you real-time position, engine status, speed, mileage. Records history trip with stop and parking mark, and multiple alarms.

The GPS tracker is super easy to install, just download the app, bind the device, and plug into your car. Plug & play, no charging or complicated cables. Support OBD-II or Micro USB power supply, built-in emergency backup battery, can maintain positioning even if cut off, providing key spot for rescue.

LNCOON 4G GPS Tracker is more than just positioning. Send push alerts for speeding, entering and exiting fences, fatigue driving, collisions, or drifting. Built-in gravity sensor to monitor the vehicle for rollover, roll and pitch, etc. Optional voice prompts remind the driver to drive safely. Ideal for new driver and elderly driver.

Unlock all features with a monthly subscription for just $9.99/month, with prepaid long-term plans down to $3.99/month. No hidden fees, no contracts, no charge on update time gradients, cancel at any time, full refund if it doesn't work.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What you can see via the LNCOON IOT platform: Location on Google MapACC Status (Moving / Idling / Stopped)Current Speed & Total MileageLatitude & LongitudeCurrent Actual AddressHistory TripStop & Parking Spot (Time, Duration, and Address)Driving Violations (Time, Address, Total Times)

Instant Notification Thousands Miles Away Peace mind of car's security by LNCOON's multiple alerts system like: Acc On/Off AlertDevice Removed AlertOverspeeding AlertCar Collision AlertFatigue Driving AlertGeo Fence Enter / Exit AlertCar Battery Low AlertBackup Battery Low Alert Combine Multiple Positioning System Combine GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO positioning system.Featured with LBS, WiFi, INS assisted positioning.Provide accurate positioning points on Google Maps, with an accuracy of less than to 5meters.Generate sharing links at any time (optional sharing duration) Smart Power Saving Mode Lncoon car tracker supports smart switching update frequency. By default, the positioning is updated every 10s when ACC on, and every 60s when ACC off. Ultra Low Power Consumption [0.2 W active / 0.05 W sleep] Allowing you to leave the gps tracker installed permanently in your vehicles. Easier to manage your fleet.

Remote Control by Lncoon IOT App After setting up the GPS tracker, you can remotely control the settings of the device: Set location update timeSwitch on/off defense mode (vibration sensor)Set the vibration sensitivitySwitch on/off any alertSet thresholds for speeding, harsh sharp turn, and fatigue drivingSwitch on/off LED lightsSwitch on/off voice promptsSet the voice volume of voice prompts Polygonal Geofences for Various Blocks In Lncoon IOT app, you can quickly create circular fences and choose to alert you when vehicles enter or exit, or both.In lncoon web, you can create polygonal fences that fit the blocks.lncoon web also supports practical functions such as digital distance measuring scale, car finding in the drawing area We have the best solution for whether personal tracking or corporate fleet tracking. Perfect Replica of the Actual Track Lncoon fleet gps tracker for vehicles has a built-in accelerometer and gyroscope to assist in calculating the mileage & speed of the car.With the intelligent calculation of the INS system, percise positioning can be obtained even in places with weak GPS signals, with an accuracy as high as 98%.The track drawn by the anchor point can be perfect replica of the actual track.

Positioning System GPS+GLONASS+BDS+GALILEO+LBS+WiFi Positioning Accuracy < 2.5m CEP Track Sensitivity -165 dBm Acquisition Sensitivity -148 dBm (cold) / -163 dBM (hot) TTFF (open sky) Avg. hot start ≤1sec; Avg. cold start ≤32sec 4G Network Band Cat M1: B2/B4/B5/B12/B13l; Cat NB2: B2/B4/B5/B12/B13J Built-in Backup Battery 50mAh industrial-grade LiCo battery Input Voltage 9-36V DC LED Indication GPS (Blue), Cellular (Green), Power (Red) Connector OBD II port SIM Nano-SIM (Included in the device) USB 1 x Micro-USB for Power Supply and Configuration Sensors Accelerometer and Gyroscope Ignition Detection External Power Voltage Dimensions 2.36'' x 1.97'' x 0.98'' Weight 2.11 oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lncoon GPS Trackers are the best GPS tracking devises I have ever used.
reviews.reviewText: I have I have been using GPS devices professionally for 20 years. I've used dozens of different devices with just as many companies. I purchased my first GPS device from LNcoon on Amazon one year ago. I have now purchased seven more. I can't imagine using any other GPS location device provider. The app and website tracking platform are easy to use for a novice or someone experienced like me. I am most pleased with the prompt and arcuate communication and service they provide though email.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No alerts worked. I never received any alerts despite that they were toggled on in the settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No problem with it since I got it easy to use and easy to understand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so very unhappy with my trackers, I purchased 2 since my elderly mom has 2 vehicles. They will not activate and I have done everything it says to do. I have sent e mails to the support and I get nothing in return. I should of known better than to purchase anything like this off the internet. I didn't even want to give this one star but it wouldn't let me not.Update: Support finally contacted me and we were able to get one device working correctly, I am happy with it. The other one they ended up sending me another device but I still am not able to get it working. I can say they have been helpful and it has been appreciated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two such devices and I must admit that I am impressed they work very well the installation is very simple and above all they have reasonable prices if you don't know how to do something just contact the customer service and they will help you in a short time, the customer service is very understanding and nice I recommend it to everyone works great you always know what's going on with your vehicles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been able to keep track of my vehicle I’m on vacation. The signal is on point and the installation is really simple. When registering and signing up for service you have to make sure to select the country correctly where the device is. The car is in PR and I monitor from the US.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No alerts, AND No updates… Complete misrepresentation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this VL04 after trying out a JC400 dashcam from the same manufacturer. The VL04 GPS tracker is super easy to install and is more accurate because it gets the first fix very quickly after starting the vehicle unless the vehicle is in a garage or other covered area that might block the GPS signal, in which case it can take 2-3 minutes. Get positioning. After that, cranking the settings up to max so it reports the location every 10 seconds, I can see the path the car is taking very accurately in the Lncoon app.In my case, I installed it in a Peugeot 5008 SUV, with a 15cm OBD extension cable that would move it to the side of the OBD port and be able to close the lid covering it.After binding the device, I need to top up. I first purchased a 1-month subscription for $12.99. So far, the experience is pretty well. I will always need it. When it's expired, I will directly subscribe to the 24-month plan, which only costs 5.99 USD per month.I'm not using any dangerous driving detection, lane changing, etc, as I have it on my personal car just to monitor it occasionally and possibly to help in the event of a carjacking (You know, cuz of the recent increase in carjackings).I recommend checking out the full list of commands available in the issues section to get the most out of this tracker. Commands can be sent by the Lncoon App.Overall, it's a perfect car tracker for me."
